title: Constitutional

en: You've been working without a break for most of the past few days and your body is starting to complain. However, you have a deadline coming up and can't afford a day off. How do you deal with this?

no_caption: Do some stretches and get back to work

en: You take a long walk around the neighborhood to clear your mind. It helps, and you are more energetic and productive when you get back to work.
You stretch your muscles and, while they calm for a bit, they start to ache again after an hour. You accept the pain and try to work around it.
